DOC.brief_summary: This study aim identify whether breast milk ( BM ) diet would improve outcomes neonates congenital gastrointestinal disorder ( CGD ) facilitate early transition parenteral nutrition ( PN ) .
DOC.criteria: Neonates admit Egleston Neonatal intensive care unit ( NICU ) never feed Congenital gastrointestinal abnormality gastroschisis , bowel atresia , malrotation , omphalocele , meconium ileus Previous feed
